TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TreeNodeStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style
Public NotInheritable Class TreeNodeStyle Inherits Style
public ref class TreeNodeStyle sealed : System::Web::UI::WebControls::Style

summary.span: 表示 控制項中節點的樣式。

span.span: Represents the style of a node in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來代表中的節點樣式控制項。Use the class to represent the style of a node in the control. 控制項可讓您指定不同的樣式特性 （例如字型大小和色彩） 的每個不同的節點類型。The control allows you to specify different style characteristics (such as font size and color) for each of the different node types. 下表列出支援的節點樣式類別。The following table lists the node styles that are supported by the class. |節點的樣式屬性Node style property|描述Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| ||當滑鼠指標移至上方的節點樣式設定。The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||分葉節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the leaf nodes.| ||節點的預設樣式設定。The default style settings for a node.| ||父節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the parent nodes.| ||根節點的樣式設定。The style settings for the root node.| ||選取的節點樣式設定。The style settings for a selected node.| 當您將節點的樣式屬性控制項，其會依下列順序套用：When you set the node style properties of the control, they are applied in the following order: 1. 。. 2. ，或，取決於節點類型。, , or , depending on the node type. 3. 。. 4. 。. 5. 。. 類別會繼承其成員的大部分類別。The class inherits most of its members from the class. 它會擴充類別透過提供控制的一個節點，在文字周圍的空間，以及相鄰節點之間的間距數量的屬性。It extends the class by providing properties that control the amount of space around the text in a node, as well as the space between adjacent nodes. 使用屬性，即可控制量左側和右側的節點中的文字。Use the property to control the amount of space to the left and right of the text in a node. 同樣地，屬性會控制和節點中的文字下方，上述的間距數量。Similarly, the property controls the amount of space above and below the text in a node. 您可以控制的節點之間的間距大小，套用至所設定與其相鄰節點屬性。You can control the amount of spacing between the node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes by setting the property. 若要控制的父節點與子節點之間的間距大小，請使用屬性。To control the amount of spacing between a parent node and a child node, use the property. 如需繼承的樣式設定的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the inherited style settings, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何控制中的父節點的外觀控制項的樣式屬性來設定從傳回的物件屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the control by setting the style properties of the object that is returned from the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的 物件資訊，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified object information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別所指定的物件`bag`參數。Use the constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class by using the object that is specified by the `bag` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit ChildNodesPadding { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.ChildNodesPadding : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定父節點與套用 類別之子節點之間的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space between a parent node and a child node to which the class is applied.

value.span: 父節點之子節點區段上方或下方的間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is above and below the child nodes section of a parent node.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制空間上方和下方的節點之子節點區段類別套用。Use the property to control the amount of space above and below the child nodes section of the node to which the class is applied. 此間距會插入的父節點和其第一個子節點之間，以及其最後一個子節點之間的下一個節點。This spacing is inserted between the parent node and its first child node, as well as between its last child node and the next node. > [!NOTE] > 如果沒有其他節點後面的最後一個子節點，因為這不會留下不必要的間隔，底部的控制項，則不會呈現在最後一個子節點之後的空間。The space after the last child node is not rendered if there are no additional nodes following the last child node, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the bottom of the control. 若要控制的子節點之間的空間量，使用屬性。To control the amount of space between child nodes, use the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定空間上方和下方的父節點之子節點區段。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the space above and below the child nodes section of a parent node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The to copy.

summary.span: 將指定之 物件的樣式屬性複製至目前的 物件。

span.span: Copies the style properties of the specified object into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以重複指定的樣式屬性物件中呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to duplicate the style properties of the specified object in the object that calls this method. > [!NOTE] > 在目前的所有屬性物件中指定的對應屬性以取代物件。All properties in the current object are replaced by the corresponding properties in the specified object. 若要複製樣式屬性，而不會取代任何已設定值，請使用方法。To copy style properties without replacing any values that have already been set, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，將指定的樣式屬性複製物件到呼叫這個方法的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to copy the style properties of the specified object into the object that calls this method. 請注意，會取代所有的樣式屬性。Notice that every style property is replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/CS/treenodestylecopyfromcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleCopyFrom/VB/treenodestylecopyfromvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定節點中文字左側和右側的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space to the left and right of the text in the node.

value.span: 節點文字左側和右側的間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, that is to the left and right of the node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制水平空間文字周圍之節點的數量套用。Use the property to control the amount of horizontal space around the text of the node to which the is applied. 此空間會插入文字的左邊的緣與文字區域的框線之間，以及文字右邊緣與文字框線之間。This space is inserted between the left edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the right edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制的垂直間距，請使用屬性。To control the vertical spacing, use the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制節點文字周圍的水平空間。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the horizontal space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定節點旁顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 節點旁顯示之自訂影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to a custom image that is displayed next to the node.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定樣式的自訂映像。Use the property to specify a custom image for style. 此映像顯示之節點旁，它可以是任何映像檔案格式 （例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 等等），只要用戶端瀏覽器支援該格式。This image is displayed next to the node, and it can be in any image-file format (such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and so on), as long as the client browser supports that format. 如果兩個並屬性設定，該影像會顯示所指定的一個屬性。If both the and properties are set, the image that is displayed is the one that is specified by the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state.

span.span: The selected value is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void MergeWith(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style s) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub MergeWith (s As Style)

span.span: The that will merge with the current node's settings.

summary.span: 將指定之 物件的樣式屬性與目前 物件的樣式屬性組合。

span.span: Combines the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來結合指定的樣式屬性物件的樣式屬性從呼叫這個方法的物件。Use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with the style properties of the object that this method is called from. > [!NOTE] > 方法加入的樣式屬性，藉由設定中目前未設定每個屬性物件及其對應的值，指定物件。The method joins the style properties by setting each property that is not set in the current object with its corresponding value in the specified object. 尚未設定的屬性會更新。Only properties that have not been set are updated. 如果在指定的屬性物件未設定，在目前的對應屬性物件不會變更。If a property in the specified object is not set, the corresponding property in the current object does not change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來結合指定的樣式屬性物件與呼叫這個方法的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to combine the style properties of the specified object with those of the object that calls this method. 請注意，只有未設定屬性會被取代。Notice that only the unset properties are replaced. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/CS/treenodestylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/VB/treenodestylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit NodeSpacing { System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit get(); void set(System::Web::UI::WebControls::Unit value); };
member this.NodeSpacing : System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定套用 物件之節點與其相鄰節點之間的垂直間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of vertical spacing between the node to which the object is applied and its adjacent nodes.

value.span: 套用 之節點與相同層級之相鄰節點之間的垂直間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of vertical space, in pixels, between the node to which the is applied and its adjacent nodes at the same level.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制節點之間的垂直間距量，套用至相同的層級與其相鄰節點。Use the property to control the amount of vertical spacing between a node that the is applied to and its adjacent nodes at the same level. 此空間是上限和插入目前節點的上邊緣與上一個節點的下邊緣之間，以及目前節點的下邊緣之間的下一個節點的邊緣。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the current node and the lower edge of the previous node, as well as between the lower edge of the current node and upper edge of the next node. 上方的空間則不會呈現的第一個節點控制項，因為這不會留下不必要的間隔，頂端的控制項。The upper space is not rendered for the first node in the control, because this would leave an unnecessary gap at the top of the control. 和屬性會獨立套用。The and properties are applied independently. 節點已展開不會影響節點的間距。Whether or not the node is expanded does not affect the node spacing. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定在樹狀目錄中的節點與相同層級與其相鄰節點之間的垂直間距。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical spacing between a node and its adjacent nodes at the same level in the tree. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 將 物件返回至其原始狀態。

span.span: Returns the object to its original state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以移除任何先前定義的樣式項目，以及重設為其原始 （也就是預設值） 狀態的物件。Use the method to remove any previously defined style elements and reset the object to its original (that is, default) state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來傳回為其預設狀態的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to return the object to its default state. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/CS/treenodestylemergewithcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyleMergeWith#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyleMergeWith/VB/treenodestylemergewithvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定節點文字上方和下方的間距。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of space above and below the text for a node.

value.span: 節點文字上方和下方的間距 (單位為像素)，

span.span: The amount of space, in pixels, above and below a node's text.
The default is 0 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制文字周圍的之節點的垂直空間數量類別套用。Use the property to control the amount of vertical space around the text of the node to which the class is applied. 此空間會插入文字的上邊緣之間的文字區域中，框線和文字的下邊緣與文字框線之間。This space is inserted between the upper edge of the text and the border of the text area, as well as between the lower edge of the text and the border for the text. 若要控制水平間距，請使用屬性。To control the horizontal spacing, use the property. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定節點的垂直空間文字周圍。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the vertical space around the text of a node. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/CS/treenodestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeNodeStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeNodeStyle/VB/treenodestylevb.aspx#1)]
